bioconda.name: bpipe
bioconda.summary: Bpipe - a tool for running and managing bioinformatics pipelines

biocontainers.name: bpipe
biocontainers.summary: This software provides a platform for running big bioinformatics jobs that consist of a series of processing stages – known as ‘pipelines’.

biotools.summary: This software provides a platform for running big bioinformatics jobs that consist of a series of processing stages – known as ‘pipelines’.

bioschemas.name: Bpipe
bioschemas.summary: This software provides a platform for running big bioinformatics jobs that consist of a series of processing stages – known as ‘pipelines’.
